page.title: 14EDUCATION IN MYDDLE
page.content: {Myddle SCHOOL}is the only SCHOOL in our D block. There are 3 teachers. 1 infant teacher and 2 junior teachers. It is a small SCHOOL with only 3 classrooms,a music room,a library, toilets,a staff room,a kitchen,5 stock rooms and a heads room. There are only{78 CHILDREN}in the SCHOOL.The 3rd and 4th years are in the top class.The 1st and 2nd are in the middle class and the infants are in the first class. The schoolchildren from{Harmer Hill come on the bus in the morning then after SCHOOL the CHILDREN from over 2 miles away go on the taxi.The other CHILDREN go in cars.Myddle is a Primary SCHOOL and has children of ages 5 to 11 years.After Myddle SCHOOL the CHILDREN go to{Bashchurch {Comprehensive School .
